description: This file defines a React component named SourcesPage. The component provides a user interface for uploading documents and viewing the result of the last upload operation. It imports React and an UploadWidget component, manages local state for the last upload result, and renders a page with a header, description, upload widget, and conditional display of last upload results.

methods.name: SourcesPage()
methods.description: React functional component for managing document sources, including upload and result display.
